ca.mcgill.ecse211.finalproject.controller

Class BlockDetection

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.finalproject.controller.BlockDetection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LightController, UltrasonicController

    public class BlockDetection
extends java.lang.Object
implements UltrasonicController, LightController
    Detects block color using light sensor readings. In the competition, this class will take care of first finding blocks and secondly finding the right block which represents the opponents flag.
